author: Staff Reporter
text:
The district administration established six direct procurement centres to buy paddy from farmers, said a release from Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan here on Saturday.

The DPCs were established in Thittuvilai Primary Agriculture Cooperative Society, Thazhakkudi Anganwadi Centre, Old VAO office in Chenbagaramanpudur, Regulated Market in Nagercoil, Boomi Paadhukkappu Sangam in Kurunthancode and Kavimani Nool Nilayam in Therur.

The DPCs would be kept open from 8 a.m. to 10 a.m. and 2 p.m. to 6 p.m. on all week days, the release added.
title: 6 DPCs established
